entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
